title: Update regarding HeavyTrucks Inc.
story_body:
HeavyTrucks Inc. (TRUCK) is reportedly the subject of a potential acquisition, according to people familiar with the matter. 

As of 08:45 EST, sources indicate that an unidentified entity is exploring the possibility of acquiring HeavyTrucks Inc. Details regarding the prospective acquirer and terms of the potential deal remain unconfirmed.

It is worth noting that these rumors have not been substantiated by HeavyTrucks Inc. or any other parties allegedly involved in the negotiations. HeavyTrucks Inc. has not issued an official statement regarding the matter.

People familiar with the situation caution that discussions are preliminary and may not result in a definitive agreement. The exact nature and timing of any potential transaction, if it occurs, remain speculative at this time.

HeavyTrucks Inc. did not immediately respond to a request for comment. As of 09:00 EST, the company's shares are trading in line with the broader market.
